content.text: Trial 1/5, Stage 'slant': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

The image shows an object with a groove oriented at a slant. Based on the visible orientation of the groove within the frame, the groove runs at an angle that is neither parallel nor perpendicular to the main axes.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [208.33, 0, 41.67],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [41.67, 0, 141.67]
  ]
}
```
